channel.title: Spring on SURC
channel.description: Recent content in Spring on SURC

item.title: Vocabulary
item.description: 1 typos n. 错别字 assistance n. 援助，帮助；辅助设备 template n. 模板，样板 identical adj. 同一的；完全相同的 n. 完全相同的事物 exactly adv. 恰好地；正是；精确地；正确地 succinct adj. 简洁的 relevant adj. 相关的；切题的；中肯的；有重大关系的；有意义的，目的明确的 override vt.

item.title: Sentence
item.description: 1 For example, if you need to add a dependency to a class, that dependency can be satisfied automatically without you needing to modify the configuration. 例如，如果需要向类添加依赖项，则可以自动满足该依赖项，而不需要修改配置。 Thus autowiring can be especially useful during development, without negating the option of switching to explicit wiring when the code base becomes more stable. 因此，自动装配在开发过程中特别有用，当代码库变得更加稳定时，自动装配可以避免切换到显式连接的选项。 Implement the more fine-grained control available with annotation-based configuration 通过基于注释的配置实现更细粒度的控制
